lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that Ethan Couch should remain in custody for now at a juvenile detention center in Fort Worth, where he has been held since he was deported from Mexico.
snippet: A judge ruled that Ethan Couch should remain in custody for now at a juvenile detention center in Fort Worth, where he has been held since he was deported from Mexico.

headline.main: Texas: ‘Affluenza’ Teenager Stays in Juvenile Jail
headline.print_headline: Texas: ‘Affluenza’ Teenager Stays in Juvenile Jail

abstract: Judge rules Ethan Couch, known as affluenza teenager due to unorthodox defense mounted in case against him for killing four people while driving drunk, will remain in juvenile detention center in Fort Worth, Tex; Couch faces hearing to determine if his case will be moved to adult system.
